resources.string: This screen contains brief instructions on how to use the application. The first time you use it, you need to do a test that will determine your current knowledge of the language. Based on the level of current knowledge, we will be able to offer you certain grammatical units that you should study in order to improve your knowledge. All lessons contain detailed explanations and short self-assessment quizzes. Once you think you have mastered all the recommended lessons, you can retake the test to eventually move to a higher level of and continue learning
Welcome to Albion, an educational application for learning simple and complex grammatical structures of the English language.
If you are a first-time user, please take the test so we can determine your current level of English
Or if you are already in the process of learning and have gotten accustomed to using this app, you can continue studying and learn something new today
